instruction: Given a list of items, provide an outline of a story that includes all of the items on the list.
input: List of items: spaceship, alien, park, river, diamond
output: A spaceship lands near a park that overlooks a river. The starship is piloted by a friendly alien who is in search of a diamond. When the alien finds the diamond and activates it, it reveals a secret map of the stars. With the help of the map, the alien sets out on a new mission while the people of the nearby park watch in wonder.
